descriptionlist.description: Just another FLEX loader. Why? because we need one more. This one flexes on all other loaders ;D

FLEX (Flipboard Explorer) is a set of debugging and exploration tools for iOS development. When presented, FLEX shows a toolbar that lives in a window above your application. From this toolbar, you can view and modify nearly every piece of state in your running application.
Activation: - Long press on status bar - Long press anywhere with three finger

Additional Features: - Displayed above Alerts (including SpringBoard alerts) - Prevent sleep on lockscreen when using exploring through the FLEX views - Dismiss explorer window using the done navigation bar instead of having to go all the way to initial view - Fix color of status bar when FLEX explorer is displayed on homescreen
